def count_inversions(yaz):
    n = len(yaz)
    if n <= 1:
        return 0
    mid = n // 2
    left_count = count_inversions(yaz[:mid])
    right_count = count_inversions(yaz[mid:])
    merge_count = merge_and_count(yaz, 0, mid, n)
    return left_count + right_count + merge_count

def merge_and_count(yaz, left, mid, right):
    i = left
    j = mid
    count = 0
    temp = []
    while i < mid and j < right:
        if yaz[i] <= yaz[j]:
            temp.append(yaz[i])
            i += 1
        else:
            temp.append(yaz[j])
            count += mid - i
            j += 1
    temp += yaz[i:mid]
    temp += yaz[j:right]
    yaz[left:right] = temp
    return count
